definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: However, the present recognition of TV essays still remains on the text-oriented level.
sentences.chinese: 但当前对电视散文的认识仍然停留在文本主导论层次。

sentences.english: There are beautiful prose poetry offered in our Prose and Poetry section.
sentences.chinese: 在“散文诗”这个栏目里有许多美妙的散文诗提供。

sentences.english: There are beautiful prose poetry offered in our Prose and Poetry section.
sentences.chinese: 在“散文诗”这个栏目里有许多美妙的散文诗提供。

sentences.english: The inscriptive writings are attaches after the certain carrier the short nimble miscellany prose.
sentences.chinese: “题跋”是附于一定载体之后的短小灵活的杂记散文。

sentences.english: On innovative spirits as a pearl in Zhenjiang history and culture;
sentences.chinese: 易中天以其独特的历史散文创作影响一时。

sentences.english: It's my honor to make prelude for the collected essays.
sentences.chinese: 如今能为这本散文集作序，我觉得很荣幸。

sentences.english: Third, they haven't established the conscious awareness of language enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 当代散文尚未建立起自觉的语言赏玩意识。

sentences.english: The Prophet is a poetry collection written by Gibran, a forerunner of Arabic contemporary literature.
sentences.chinese: 《先知》是阿拉伯现代文学先驱纪伯伦的一部散文诗。

sentences.english: It is concerned more with verse than prose and represents the Poetics of Gongorism.
sentences.chinese: 它更多关注诗句而非散文，代表了贡戈拉流派的诗学。

sentences.english: It is a beautifully written prose-poem.
sentences.chinese: 它写得像散文诗一样优美。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhong Shuliang s prose creation is characterized with rich achievements in large quantities.
sentences.chinese: 钟树梁先生散文创作数量繁多，成果丰硕。

sentences.english: He would certainly have done more justice to simple and elegant prose.
sentences.chinese: 他一定善于朗读质朴风雅的散文。

sentences.english: Bingxin's proses made great contributions to establish a standard for modern Chinese language.
sentences.chinese: 冰心散文对建立现代汉语的典范卓有贡献。

sentences.english: Translated into French prose from a poem by Thomas Moore.
sentences.chinese: 散文翻译成法文，从诗的托马斯莫尔。

sentences.english: Take a poem with a strong story and re-write it as prose.
sentences.chinese: 找一篇故事性强的诗歌，用散文的形式重写。

sentences.english: This is mainly because of Zeng Gong's prose and ideas are special.
sentences.chinese: 这主要是因为曾巩的散文和思想比较特殊。

definition: a pre-Tang Dynasty genre of poetry, relatively free in form, usually having four, five, six or seven characters per line
